ComicInfo.Title: The Wondermen, Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
"CARNIVALE"
Calie and Violet have no means of returning to Wonderland, but that hardly means that Wonderland is finished with them! The war continues on Earth when Calie, Violet, and the Dark Cheshire come upon a cult of Wonderland worshippers - the Wondermen!
With a defunct carnival as a temple, a gospel of chaos leads men and women to extreme acts of violence and self-mutilation as they create their own twisted sideshow.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Sabine Rich | 1 | B | Cover B | Noah Salonga & Victor Bartlett | 2 | C | Cover C | Paolo Pantalena & Ula Mos | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-25 17:51:55. [CVDB512500]

ComicInfo.Inker: Giorgia Sposito, Paolo Pantalena, Giorgia Sposito
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Noah Salonga, Paolo Pantalena, Sabine Rich, Urszula Mos, Victor Bartlett
ComicInfo.Editor: Patrick Shand, Ralph Tedesco, Pat Shand
ComicInfo.Characters: Calie Liddle, Dark Cheshire, Violet Liddle
